properties.title: Capanna di Sciora CAS
properties.description: Located at the foot of the Sciora range, the alpine cabin attracts climbers with difficult climbing routes as much as with the view of the dominating face of Pizzo Badile. The regularly enlarged stone building blends in well with the monumental landscape. It offers summer hikes on the «Sentiero Alpino Bregaglia» such as across Cacciabella Sud to Albigna-Hütte (Viäl to Capanna Sasc Furä is closed due to threatening landslides).
